title: Government High School, D.K. Pora Overview
author: Itzfew
content: Government High School is a reputable government educational institution located in D.K. Pora, Shopian district, Jammu & Kashmir.This school serves the local rural community offering education primarily at the middle school level.As a government school, it provides free education and follows the curriculum set by district education authorities.Located in D.K. Pora village, it is one of the few government schools available locally, catering to students from nearby areas.
